author: cbbrainerd
body:
Changed L1T DQM Offline sequences to use L1T Stage 2 modules and to produce the same histograms as L1T DQM Online sequences.

Automatically ported from CMSSW_8_1_X #16095 (original by @cbbrainerd).
Automatically ported from CMSSW_9_0_X #16639 (original by @cbbrainerd).
Please wait for a new IB (12 to 24H) before requesting to test this PR.
title: L1T DQM Offline Stage 2 upgrades
